    public abstract class FileViewBase
extends SubWindow
    Base class for file viewer and file editor.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

    • Field Detail

      • messageBox

        protected MessageBox messageBox
        Sink for messages that should not go on the main text area.

      • charsetList

        protected javax.swing.JComboBox charsetList
        The character set selection drop down list. Selection changes trigger document reload.

    • Constructor Detail

        Constructor takes root window, the file to show and a config object.
        Parameters:
        owner - root window
        title - window title
        file - to be displayed
        config - environment information

    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        protected abstract void loadFile()
        Implement this to load the target file into the respective TextComponent, using the character set defined by this.getCharset().

      • getNorthComponent

        protected javax.swing.JComponent getNorthComponent()
        Returns the swing component that will be placed in the NORTH part of the windows BorderLayout. The default implementation Adds the file path and a dropdown list for the character set to be used.
        Returns:
        swing component or null.

      • getCenterComponent

        protected javax.swing.JComponent getCenterComponent()
        Returns the swing component that will be placed in the CENTER part of the windows BorderLayout. The default implementation returns null.
        Returns:
        swing component or null.

      • getSouthComponent

        protected javax.swing.JComponent getSouthComponent()
        Returns the swing component that will be placed in the SOUTH part of the windows BorderLayout. The default implementation returns null.
        Returns:
        swing component or null.

      • getLocalizer

        protected Localizer getLocalizer()
        Returns the current localizer instance. This is a shortcut for getConfig().getLocalizer().
        Returns:
        Localizer

      • getConfig

        protected SwingConfig getConfig()
        Returns the application configuration.
        Returns:
        configuration object

      • getTargetFile

        protected TargetFile getTargetFile()
        Returns the TargetFile object that encapsulates the file to be displayed.
        Returns:
        respective TargetFile instance

      • getCharset

        protected java.nio.charset.Charset getCharset()
        Returns the character set to be used to read the target file. Returns the character set defined for the target file if any, or the default character set if no specific character set is defined for the file.
        Returns:
        character set to be used to read the target file
